page.title: 02LAW AND ORDER
page.content: THE ROLE OF THE POLICE A policeman is an ordinary member of society who prevents and detects crimes. The nearest prison to Doncaster is{Armley,}Leeds. The police do not often visit court except when an accused person pleads innocence. The police drive marked cars which are often{Vauxhall {Chevettes}with a radio link. To be in the{South Yorkshire Police Force}you need to be five feet ten inches tall. The lowest rank in the Force is that of police constable . After joining there is a two weeks initial training, followed by ten weeks at{RAF {Dishforth. }This is then followed by a further four weeks with a tutor. The final stage in training is a two year probationary period.
